2. Aaron King

Aaron King
==========

Aaron King, Council Place 6
---------------------------

![Aaron King_ Headshot_ June 2025](https://www.huttotx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6023)

[Email Aaron King](mailto:%20aaron.king@huttotx.gov)

Aaron King and his wife have called Hutto home for the past four years, drawn by its reputation as one of the safest communities in the Austin area. Together, they have five children and six grandchildren, and they are active members of their church, where they serve as Deacons and contribute to various community initiatives.

Aaron brings real-world experience and a citizen-first mindset to the Hutto City Council. He has a strong background in project management across the roofing, semiconductor, and telecommunications industries, and he is a former small business owner of King’s Martial Arts Academy.

He understands the importance of efficiency, accountability, and local business support. Aaron is committed to keeping taxes low while cutting wasteful spending, investing in infrastructure for responsible growth, strengthening public safety, supporting small businesses, and preserving Hutto’s unique identity and environment. Aaron was elected as Councilmember Place 6 in June 2025.
